content: chore: adaptations for nightly-2025-03-20 #23163 Please review this PR. At the end of the month this diff will land in 'master'.
LGTM. Some upstreaming/renaming, but the big change is in opaqueness of definitions from lean#5182.

I just reviewed. I agree these changes look great, the new proofs look better to me. I was confused about why we were immediately deprecating a new lemma which just appeared in core but I suspect I'm just not understanding the system.

Oh -- the lemma got moved up to Lean, but @Paul Reichert also changed the statement slightly.

So I left a copy in Mathlib, with an additional prime on the name, but deprecated it. It's not ideal, but leaves slightly more of a breadcrumb if anyone goes looking. It didn't break anything in Mathlib, so hopefully no one even notices.
Oh of course, it's the double-primed statement which is deprecated :face_palm:

Thanks for adding the primed statement as a fallback, Kim! :+1: I should have been a bit more careful with the change of signature as it could be breaking in some cases even though the new signature is definitionally equal to the old one.
